events

Class EventGenerator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • events.EventGenerator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - listener interface
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventGenerator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GVEventGenerator, LogicEventGenerator

    public abstract class EventGenerator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEventGenerator<T>
    Generates the events and fire them. The logic and game view generator are subclasses.
    Author:
    Jasper S.
